channel.title: NYS:CAT on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in NYS:CAT on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Caterpillar Sees Tariff Impact of Up to $1.8 Billion This Year
item.description: Caterpillar Inc. is warning investors that it’s now expecting tariffs to have an impact of as much as $1.8 billion on the company this year, higher than its guidance in early August.

item.title: Caterpillar Sees Tariff Impact of Up to $1.8 Billion This Year
